programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters 5

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall 1
programme.desc: Having learnt where a hippos aggression comes from Steve wants to find out if we can live alongside the animal that kills up to 500 people a year. He visits St.Lucia, a town where hippos roam the streets freely at night, feeding on the manicured lawns and bushes of the townsfolk. In order to see them out of the water he must come back at night.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball

Their search for clues leads them to a strange egg, which they discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realises it's their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: All-Star Superman
programme.desc: Fuelled by hatred and jealousy, Lex Luthor masterminds a plot to kill the Man of Steel. Poisoned by solar radiation, Superman is dying.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After failing to catch Lamput again and again, the Docs notice that they lack something crucial in order to be successful in life, a good moustache! With their new found facial hair, the world now bends to their will!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Foghorn Leghorn attempts to charm his future father-in-law. Daffy does a card trick. Elmer discovers a scaly surprise.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: A young Blader arrives in Xenon City, full of dreams.

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes: Justice League:Gotham City Breakout

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: It's Beast Boy's birthday! But will the other Titans remember?

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Mouse uses an invention that causes the others to swap voices.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: When the manor hosts a fox hunt, Tom is in charge of a young boy who desperately wants to take part in the hunt. Unfortunately for Tom, a sneaky fox creates mayhem for everyone.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything?

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Petunia Pig wants a new picture for her fireplace mantle, but her photoshoot goes a little nutty. Seeing a hawk swoop down from the sky to grab a snake gives Wile E. Coyote a brilliant idea for how to catch Road Runner.

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes: Justice League Vs. Bizarro League
programme.desc: The diabolical Darkseid threatens to destroy Bizarro World, leaving Superman's strange alter ego with no choice but to come to Earth and seek the help of the Justice League in saving the entire galaxy from the wrath of the scheming villain.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: After a head-on collision cracks Buster Dran, Khrome reflects on his time with Jaxon.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Clarence bonds with girl called Amy from down the street, as they both search for a monster-sized boulder called an 'erratic'.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Raven shows the rest of the Titans that books can be fun.

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: When Jimmy gets kidnapped, it’s up to Lois and Clark to save him – but rescuing Jimmy will lead them into danger as they deal with mad scientists, military secrets, and relationship woes!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Clark tries to plan a normal date without any Superman problems – but gets interrupted when Mr. Mxyzptlk sweeps him, Jimmy, and Lois into a high-stakes, multiverse-hoping chase!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Lois meets her journalism idol, Vicki Vale – only for Vicki to make Lois question her loyalty to Superman. Meanwhile, Superman hunts down Task Force X while dealing with a new power!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: Superman finally gets answers to who he is and where he came from, while coming face-to-face with The General, leader of Task Force X. Meanwhile, Lois and Jimmy must find Superman before Dr. Ivo destroys Metropolis!

programme.title: My Adventures With Superman
programme.desc: It’s Thanksgiving, and Clark, Lois, and Jimmy are heading to the Kent farm to celebrate – but the holiday turns into a fight for survival as Task Force X, family, and Kryptonite collide!

programme.title: Steven Universe

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Rigby's estranged accountant brother comes back to help save the park from an audit. While everyone loves Don, Rigby wants nothing to do with him.

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Muriel needs a new mattress. The one she orders comes with a bonus: a demon, which takes over her body. Courage must find a way to get rid of the demon and the new mattress.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: While everyone prepares for the park's annual barbecue, things go awry when Rigby accidentally burns Benson's hot dogs.

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: While digging in search of his lost yo-yo, Courage finds a locked box that once belonged to Eustace's decreased brother, Horst. Believing the box contains his brother's money, Eustace tries to open it and fails. Seeking help.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the ranger's mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Tom And Jerry

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon – footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the ‘dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldn’t believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon – footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the ‘dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson embeds with the team of one of the most extreme, avalanche-prone mountain ski mountains in the world - Snowbird. They battle to keep the steep and deep slopes safe with shovels, snowcats and even a WWII Howitzer cannon.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes to the biggest automated package sorting facility in the world - UPS Worldport in Louisville, Kentucky. Two million packages go through here every day, and it's up to the hardhat heroes behind the scenes to make it all happen.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, Mike Davidson is on streets, in tunnels, on tracks and in trolley restoration garages - working shoulder-to-shoulder with the team that keeps one of America's largest and oldest mass transit systems running smoothly and on time.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: Examine '60s ad men and women and how they used wit and irony to reach a new audience, consequently revolutionizing the industry.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how stricter rules and public mistrust inspired 1970s advertisers to create some of history's greatest campaigns.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how advertisers used a new optimism and new technology to sell big in the "Greed is Good" era.

programme.title: 9/11: Stories In Fragments
programme.desc: Among the ruins of the buildings destroyed on 9/11, the everyday items and the ordinary citizens that discovered them share their stories of that unforgettable day.

programme.title: 9/11: The Heartland Tapes
programme.desc: The morning of September 11, 2001 began routinely but by 9:00 AM, the day's narrative had taken a tragic turn. This is an account of the tragedy as it unfolded, and as it aired in American cities large and small, told without narration or interviews.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu is in India for the first time in his life and wants to discover as much food as he can handle. From an Idli making lesson to a workout in the flower markets of Kolkata. Will he make it to Hong Kong on time and in one piece?

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S6 E04 - Hickory Dickory Dock (Part 2)

programme.title: CSI S3 E01 - Revenge is Best Served Cold
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Columbo S4 E05 - Playback
programme.desc: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.However, beneath all that comical exterior was probably the most dogged investigator in the Los Angeles Police Department.

There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan

programme.title: My Ring Story (S1)
programme.desc: Couples recount and retell their marriage proposal stories in extensive detail with the help of videos, photos and re-enactments.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: MasterChef hits the road for an adventure in regional Victoria. First stop is All Saints Estate in the Murray Region where Declan, Theo, Rhiannon and Cath will take part in a MasterChef time auction.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Host Matt Richards goes to the French Quarter in New Orleans, Louisiana to find the best brunch, wild card, and po boy dishes.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Daymond John visits the guys to talk shop and share his expertise. Excited about the prospect of their own bricks-and-mortar, Anthony and Cedric collaborate with a celebrated pitmaster at Smorgasburg.

programme.title: The Art Of Passion
programme.desc: Hope Williams, a successful doctor, meets an accomplished artist on a girls' night out. He is everything her past lovers were not, and she discovers a side of her that she never knew existed.

programme.title: The Face I Can't Forget
programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: My Landlord Wants Me Dead
programme.desc: When Madeline loses her job, she turns to her Aunt Grace for help. A secluded ranch house with a cute neighbour seems too good to be true - until strange events begin to occur.

programme.title: Enlighten Your Life (S3)

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Seafood may not be your first thought when you think of a city like Detroit, Michigan, but at the Belgian-inspired Cadieux Cafe, Buddy tries the best bowl of steamed mussels and braised Belgian rabbit.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Sid and Sneha love the area where they bought their first townhome together. After six years living there and both working from home now, their small first home no longer fits their growing needs.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: After 23 years in their small town, Kathe and Joal have run oiut of space. Kathe's dedication to her crafts and hobbies and Joal's new interest in cooking all need extra room.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Five celebrity friends go on a trip together but at each stop where it costs money, they will have to play games against each other to be exempt from paying. One final loser will cover the costs for all.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Continuing on their Victorian road trip, the contestants find themselves in Cactus Country. Tonight sees a battle for for the last spot available in the forthcoming immunity challenge.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Deep Ellum in Dallas, TX is the live music capital of North Texas, but it's also known for having the best late night munchies and brunches around to keep the foodies energised and coming back for more.

programme.title: You Can't Escape Me

programme.desc: From beginners to pros, this gym in Tokyo welcomes people of all ages and skill levels. Each member has a unique reason for training here. We find out what they're wrestling with in their lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: This year marks the 90th anniversary of the Akechi Line, now third-sector Akechi Railway, in Gifu Prefecture. See how the railway continues to operate with local support despite financial challenges.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the realities of Asia today -- a dynamic region which faces political, economic, cultural, and technological change.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Photojournalist Sasaki Ko traveled to wartime Ukraine alone and eventually made his way to the frontlines, capturing human moments along the way. He talks about what he saw on the ground in Ukraine.

programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan

programme.title: Today's Close-Up

programme.title: The Louvre / Opposite Day
programme.desc: On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre! // Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper
programme.desc: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge
programme.desc: After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Troll Jelly / Catch That Kitty
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help the Grumples make troll jelly before the Grumpy Old Troll's snack time. / Dora and Boots have to recover El Gatito Magico and put it in its special place so all the friends stop acting like a cat.

programme.title: Babysitting Heroes
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after some baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. Now, it's up to these three babysitters to find their adorable animal friends and save the day!

programme.title: Baked Apples / Vegetable Stew
programme.desc: Chef and Olly are about to make baked apples when two apples start behaving mysteriously. // Olly takes Chef camping for the first time. But when Chef tries to cook without the comforts of the Stump, he struggles with how different everything is.

programme.title: Going Wild
programme.desc: When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: A Not So Grand Opening
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon
programme.desc: It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Whale Songs
programme.desc: Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir.

programme.title: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express
programme.desc: When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers.

programme.title: The Crew Builds Charger A Super Bed / The Crew Builds A Super Squirrely Whirly Playground
programme.desc: Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution. // Rubble and the pups build Mix, Motor, Lucas, and Lily the coolest Super Squirrely Whirly playdate ever!

programme.title: The Quarrel
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: The Library
programme.desc: Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: The Camper Van
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: The Camping Holiday
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: The Mosquito
programme.desc: Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Shooting Star
programme.desc: Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Baked Apples / Vegetable Stew
programme.desc: Chef and Olly are about to make baked apples when two apples start behaving mysteriously. // Olly takes Chef camping for the first time. But when Chef tries to cook without the comforts of the Stump, he struggles with how different everything is.

programme.title: Potato Stew
programme.desc: Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Dragon Island Duel
programme.desc: It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a race around tropical Dragon Island! But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

programme.title: Megabot!
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy
programme.desc: When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: Pups Save the Crows
programme.desc: Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case
programme.desc: There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball
programme.desc: The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo. // Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.title: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game
programme.desc: When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Sick as a Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: The Sharkdog Scoop
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: The Party Animal
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Compost
programme.desc: Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Fun Run
programme.desc: Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Washing
programme.desc: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Baked Apples / Vegetable Stew
programme.desc: Chef and Olly are about to make baked apples when two apples start behaving mysteriously. // Olly takes Chef camping for the first time. But when Chef tries to cook without the comforts of the Stump, he struggles with how different everything is.

programme.title: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Boris / Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse
programme.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: The Amazing Stunt Kitty
programme.desc: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover
programme.desc: When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.desc: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: Buttercup / We Need To Save The Corals
programme.desc: Barbidou's beautiful roses mysteriously disappeared during the night. // Barbapapa decides to tell the barbababies about the time he went to explore the Arctic and the seabed.

programme.desc: Popcorn loses his crown in Keesha's aquarium and the hamsters dive in to retrieve it. // When the hamsters go to a local hamster pageant, Clover has to unexpectedly compete.

programme.desc: When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: Video Game Heroes
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: Pups Save Floating Friends
programme.desc: The alien’s spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel
programme.desc: When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash. // Rubble & Crew decide to go big when Grocer Gabriel wants something special built outside of his grocery store.

programme.title: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta
programme.desc: Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Working Like a Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog's Got Talent
programme.desc: Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Meteor Madness
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Princess Peppa
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Teddy's Playgroup
programme.desc: Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Danny's Pirate Party
programme.desc: It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mr Potato Comes to Town
programme.desc: All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps
programme.desc: Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year. // When Chef and Olly's lettuce goes missing, they become veggie detectives to try and solve the case.

programme.title: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper
programme.desc: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn
programme.desc: Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar
programme.desc: Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken
programme.desc: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game
programme.desc: When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Nouveaux Nomades
programme.desc: Laurent Guillaume tries boating in the mountains. Guillaume Pierre travels back in time, to the origins of photography. In Paris, Yvan Hallouin plays a metallophone. Sophie Jovillard discovers special effects in the Tarn. And, to end, Carine Aigon studies the recipe for flammekueche at the Moulin de la Sarre.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: The Monastery of the Augustinian Sisters has been redesigned as a hotel complex focusing on harmony between the old and the new. At the Verdun Auditorium, the new arena perfectly sits side by side with the 1938 Art Deco wing and the beautiful EcoRad radiators.

programme.title: Proches De Détenus, Une Autre Peine
programme.desc: Being confronted with having a family member in prison is always difficult, particularly for children. Prisoners' families, around 50,000 people in Switzerland, feel as if they are sharing the sentence and with few organisations offering support coping is even harder. Their personal stories come across as a cry for help.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Isabelle shows how to save time by using off-the-shelf sauces from the supermarket for a fried rice recipe and a rice noodle salad with cabbage.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix notices that Hatter feels a bit overwhelmed by Chief who is constantly calling on him without warning, at any time of the day and night. But in trying to reduce his visits, Alix comes to realise that Chief is himself a victim of that queen of space-invaders: Big Boss.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Isabelle shows how to save time by using off-the-shelf sauces from the supermarket for a fried rice recipe and a rice noodle salad with cabbage.

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: Hélène admits that eleven years earlier, Marina had run away after surprising her with her lover. And that was when she was kidnapped. Superintendent Victoire Eberhart discovers that the man who has been pulling the strings since the beginning is none other than Paul, her lieutenant and Laurent's best friend.

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: In Ivan Claes' trunk, Laurent discovers a bloody towel and Marina's bracelet. He gives them to Paul for analysis, but the latter burns them. Laurent drags him into the forest, ready to kill him if he won't tell him where his daughter is buried. But Paul isn't the murderer...

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planète B
programme.desc: What are the greatest risks to health? How can we avoid them? The doctor-epidemiologist Jean-David Zeitoun brings us the answers and three concrete commonplace examples with the air we breathe, food and cosmetic products.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Jihye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker who has a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: Because I Love You
programme.desc: After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.

programme.title: Miracle In Cell No.7
programme.desc: A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with her young daughter in the prison.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea
programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: The Genius Paik
