programme.title: Huwag Mong Itanong Kung Bakit
programme.desc: Aning (Cherie Gil) is a maid in the Cuevas household. She is raped by an unknown assailant and comes home to the province pregnant. Her older sister Dinya (Dina Bonnevie) serves the Cuevas household to search for the culprit.

programme.title: Mga Agila Sa Arkong Bato
programme.desc: Mga Agila Sa Arkong Bato

programme.title: Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.title: Pipti-Pipti (1 Por U, 2 Por Me)
programme.desc: Jack and Popoy were escaped convicts on the trail of twenty million pesos. Others were also in search of the money but the duo were lucky enough to elude them and discovered the loot buried in some remote town.

programme.title: Jack & Jill Sa Amerika
programme.desc: Jack and Jill face a new whole adventure in America. When they received a telegram from their dead uncle’s lawyer, they were prompted to go to the US immediately. Thinking she can have everything back, Jack decides to sell her jeepney and exhaust her savings to buy their plane ticket.

programme.title: Bikini Watch
programme.desc: It's a wild and funny tale of action and romance as they encountered a mischievous group of hunks who were out to destroy the beach.

programme.title: Rizal Sa Dapitan
programme.desc: Rizal Sa Dapitan brings to the screen the events of the last four years in the life of the Filipino National Hero, Jose Rizal.

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito "Mike" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Gloria, Gloria Labandera
programme.desc: Gloria is the pretty and super sexy laundry-woman who works for a rich young couple. It turns out that her male employer is sick and tired of his wife's negative ways, so he decides to use Gloria to rile her.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Babaeng Hinugot Sa Aking Tadyang
programme.desc: Homer (Eddie Rodriguez) is an avowed bachelor but meeting Proserfina (Vivian Velez) changes him. The intriguing lass comes and goes from his house, not committing to any kind of relationship. What is Proserfina's secret?

programme.title: Paikot-Ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Tatlong Mukha ng Pag-ibig
programme.desc: Three different kinds of love stories in one picture, all of them top-billed by Sharon Cuneta.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 16
programme.desc: While Murtaugh walks on thin ice with Trish, Riggs finds an unlikely friend in Ruthie (SWOOSIE KURTZ) and Captain Avery is reunited with a college "frenemy" (WALLACE LANGHAM).

programme.title: Arrow S2 2
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu to convince Oliver to return home to Starling City, where he finds things much worse than he imagined.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin return with an explosion of brand new hacks! Tonight, they cook lasagna in a dishwasher, go back in time to discover some of history's earliest hacks, and learn how to hack breakfast using power tools.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin find out if an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack, welcome socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is really a hack from history. And there's a new doctor in town with his own hacks to save the day.

programme.title: East New York S1 1
programme.desc: Amanda Warren stars as the newly promoted boss of the 74th precinct in a working-class Brooklyn neighborhood in the midst of social upheaval.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys raise money for absurd charities at a donut shop, join diners mid-meal in a Chinese restaurant, and offer unsolicited advice to shoppers in a mall.

programme.title: Friends S6 12
programme.desc: Chandler is upset when a men's magazine prints Ross' cartoon; both Chandler and Ross claim to have originated the joke.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Hey -- wish WE'D thought of that! TruTV counts down of the 20... uh, SMARTEST inventions to ever hit the market. There's a flask for your butt, a way to re-shape your meat, and the last doughnut security system you'll ever need. Our consumer-friendlycomics, including Sean Donnelly, Gilbert Gottfried, Chris Fairbanks, and Mike Trainor are on hand to finalize the sale. Order yours now!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.
